en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors Malacca State Basketball Teams!
en.content: FusionExcel is proud to sponsor the Malacca State Men and Women's Basketball Teams with Quantum Pendants and Quantum Flasks. The Teams will be competing in the 51st Maba-Petronas Piala Agung ( King's Cup ) at Nilai, Negeri Sembilan from 22th to 30th August 2009. Photos show Team players together with FusionExcel Presidential Directors CS Chow and Tony Lim and the President of the Malacca State Basketball Association, Mr Tan Kang Yong JP, BCM.

meta.description: FusionExcel is proud to sponsor the Malacca State Men and Women's Basketball Teams with Quantum Pendants and Quantum Flasks.
meta.author: klhunter
